name: When User searches with Latitude and Longitudes, the API responds with all the near by locations. -- @1.2

steps.name: Given User has Latitude and Longitude information
When User calls the API with Latitude and Longitude details 19.076191,72.875877
Then API returns the following details of all the locations near by 19.076191,72.875877: distance, title, location_type, woeid, latt_long

fullName: FeatureLocationSearch/LocationSearch.feature:When User searches with Latitude and Longitudes, the API responds with all the near by locations.
